def main():
    n = int(input())
    cnt = 0
    ans  = 0

    while cnt < n:
        cnt += 2
        ans += 1
    return ans

def __starting_point():
    print(main())
__starting_point()

n = int(input())

amari = n % 2

if amari > 0:
    print((n//2 + 1))
else:
    print((n//2))

n = int(input())
ans = n // 2
if n % 2 != 0:
    ans += 1

print(ans)

n = int(input())
import math

if n % 2 == 0:
    print(math.floor(n / 2))

else:
    n = n + 1
    print(math.floor(n / 2))

n = int(input())
print(n//2 if n % 2 == 0 else (n+1)//2)

def resolve():
	n = int(input())
	print(n//2+(n%2!=0))

resolve()
